pullrequest.title: Add option in gui.ini to disable the use of spacenav

content.html:
I'm not sure what should be returned here. If the spacenav daemon isn't found this function logs a message No spacenav daemon found. Spacenav functionality is disabled and returns true.

The docs for SpaceNav::Load make it sound like it should return false

       /// \return True if the space navigator was successfully opened, or
      /// when the space navigator 3rd party library is not installed.
      /// False otherwise.

But the way the return value is used makes it seem like true should be returned. It's not an error that spacenav is disabled by the user's config file.

  if (!this->dataPtr->spacenav->Load())
    gzerr << "Unable to load space navigator\n";
